editorialSummary.text: Cosy rooms in a functional lodging offering complimentary breakfast & Wi-Fi, plus a gym & a pool.

text.text:
The hotel offers a perfect blend of luxury and comfort. Rooms are spacious, clean, and hygienic, with a premium feel throughout. The food is absolutely delicious whether you opt for room service or dine-in, every meal is a treat.

What truly stands out is the hospitality. The staff is incredibly friendly, courteous, and attentive, making sure your stay is seamless and stress-free. The hotel also offers great amenities, including a well-maintained gym, which adds to the experience.

A special highlight is the stunning view of the racecourse and the horses a rare and beautiful sight right from your room. Whether you're in town for work or leisure, Holiday Inn Bangalore is a top-tier choice that offers great value and an elevated stay experience.

Highly recommended!

editorialSummary.text: Warmly decorated quarters in a contemporary hotel offering a restaurant, a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
Halfway through a two-month business stay, and so far it’s been excellent. The location is very convenient, right in the heart of the city. The Gopalan Mall next door is decent for quick meals and basic groceries.

The suite itself is spacious and comfortable, with a separate bedroom, living area, terrace/patio, and en-suite bathroom. It’s well equipped with all the essential appliances. Daily housekeeping is prompt and thorough (special thanks to Vishal!), and laundry is always done well and delivered on time.

Food options are fine, though for a long stay I do wish there were more variety in Indian snacks.

Overall, a great experience so far -- highly recommended.

editorialSummary.text: Stylish quarters in a high-end resort offering upscale dining, plus indoor/outdoor pools & a spa.

text.text: Exceptional.  I had a very pleasant and enjoyable stay here with my family.  The location is great with hospitals and doctors on call nearby and surroundings being extremely peaceful strewn with villas.  Amenities are superb, the highlight being swimming pools for all ages, a tennis court and a basketball turf.  The food especially the complementary buffet breakfast is wholesome and delicious.  Hospitality is top notch with helpful and cooperative staff and housekeeping.  Rooms are very clean, spacious and well lit.  The mini bar is another highlight for drinkers.  The whole place is very well maintained with meadows and paths cleaned every now and then.  The water fall pool side dining experience is simply awesome.  I would highly recommend families for an enjoyable weekend stay.

text.text:
This property is not suitable for large family outings — in fact, it felt as though big families were not welcomed or respected. The pricing is also unreasonably high - we were charged nearly ₹40,000 for just two vegetarian meals [Lunch and dinner] for seven adults, which is exorbitant. We would rather pay that money in fine dinning restaurant, not some third class average restaurant. They don't even know how to prepare proper south Indian, filter coffee.

During breakfast, the restaurant staff selectively asked only the elderly members of our group for their room number, ignoring others. This behavior was both inappropriate and disrespectful, implying that senior guests might be unauthorized. When questioned, the staff had no explanation.

The water in the bathtub was muddy, which was quite off-putting. Additionally, we had to repeatedly remind the staff to provide us with the key for our fourth room. Despite our follow-ups, the key was only handed over by 4 PM.

Overall, the experience was underwhelming for what is advertised as a five-star “resort” — frankly, I’m not even sure it qualifies as one.

The water in the bathtub was muddy, which was quite off-putting. Additionally, we had to repeatedly remind the staff to provide us with the key for our fourth room. Despite our follow-ups, the key was only handed over by 4 PM.

Overall, the experience was underwhelming for what is advertised as a five-star “resort” — frankly, I’m not even sure it qualifies as one.

I had a wonderful experience dining at Sheraton Grand Whitefield. The food spread was truly impressive – a perfect blend of variety, flavor, and quality. Every dish we tried was delicious and thoughtfully prepared.

What made the experience even more memorable was the outstanding service. A special mention to Dhanush, who went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. He was extremely kind, attentive, and ensured all our requests were taken care of with a warm smile. It’s rare to see such genuine hospitality.

text.text:
Disappointing Food Experience at a Premium Property

I recently visited Sheraton Hotel in Whitefield expecting a top-notch culinary experience, given the brand’s reputation. Unfortunately, the food was a major letdown. Despite the elegant ambience and courteous service, the quality and taste of the food did not meet even basic expectations.

Most of the dishes lacked flavor and freshness. Items that should’ve been served hot were lukewarm, and some preparations seemed either overly salty or bland. For the price point and the Sheraton name, this was truly disappointing.

Even the buffet — which should ideally be a highlight — felt uninspired with limited variety and very average taste. It felt more like a rushed spread than a thoughtfully curated experience.

Overall, while the property itself is impressive, the culinary standards do not justify the hype or the price. Definitely not what you’d expect from a 5-star hotel.

text.text:
We had a good overall stay, though a few things could’ve been better. The rooms, while compact, were clean, well-maintained, and offered a beautiful view of Haridwar - ideal for a business/solo stay. The shower area was surprisingly spacious, though I wasn’t a fan of the toilet and washbasin being combined. Still, it served the purpose well!!

A special shoutout to the Duty Manager from the Front Office who spoke to me before check-in; he was extremely kind and thoughtful. Since I had booked the stay as a surprise weekend getaway for my sister after a long work week, he arranged for a lovely handwritten note and a small pastry cake in the room. That personal touch truly made our arrival feel special!!!!

The gym and pool were great although we wish we had the time to use them!! At the restaurant, the service team was extremely hospitable - staff like Nandini and one more girl whose name I forgot were warm and friendly, and it made breakfast enjoyable. But, this was slightly marred when Subhash interrupted our chat and called them away abruptly, citing “work,” which felt unnecessary and unprofessional - brief interactions with guests should be welcomed, not shut down!!

The breakfast had an impressive spread of South Indian dishes, which were delicious. However, the bread section was a letdown - items like the toast, croissants, danish pastries, donuts, pancakes, waffles, and French toast lacked freshness and texture. I do hope they improve this area as they host more than just Indian guests. The chef was kind enough to check in and offer alternatives, which we appreciated!!!

One area that truly fell short was the handling of my late checkout request. The Front Office Manager Mr. Mallik said he would check and get back to us reg our request while he was checking us in the late evening, but never followed up. When I ran into him the next morning at the lobby, he didn’t acknowledge me at all or provide an answer - something as simple as a “yes” or “no” would have sufficed. That lack of basic courtesy was disappointing!!!

Despite these hiccups, the overall vibe of the hotel was good. With a few improvements in professionalism and breakfast variety, it could easily move from “good” to “great.” It’s a nice spot for solo travelers - whether for a short trip or an extended work stay!!!!

I worked as a security guard at DoubleTree by Hilton Bengaluru Whitefield, near kundalahalli Metro Station, doing 12-hour shifts. I fulfilled all my duties sincerely, but I was not paid my salary. Despite several follow-ups, there was no proper response. This is highly unprofessional and reflects poorly on the management. I hope they take responsibility and treat their staff more fairly in the future as a lady security guard for 7 months.
I performed my duties with honesty and dedication. However, I have not received my salary for one full month It’s time for me to move on, but I expected better support and responsibility from such a well-known hotel brand.
I kindly request the management to clear my pending salary.

editorialSummary.text: Modern hotel with a rooftop pool, a cocktail lounge & a restaurant, plus a spa, a gym & Wi-Fi.

text.text:
I would like to extend my sincere appreciation for Mr. Shaphek from the housekeeping team. His attention to detail, professionalism, and courteous attitude truly enhanced my stay at Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bengaluru Hebbal Road. Every request was handled promptly and with a warm smile, and the room was consistently maintained to the highest standards of cleanliness and comfort.

It’s clear that Shaphek takes great pride in his work, and it reflects in the impeccable service he provides. Employees like him are a great asset to the hotel. Thank you for making my experience so pleasant and memorable!

Im editing this post after staying here for 14days.
I am quite disappointed with my recent experiences at the Mosaic restaurant in Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bengaluru Hebbal Road. The “on-the-table” menu service is extremely slow — on one occasion, I had to wait at least 15–20 minutes just for a simple omelette, and on another day, the same delay happened for a boiled egg. Even after following up 3–4 times, there was no sense of urgency from the staff to serve the order. Eventually, on both occasions, I had to leave after waiting 20 minutes without being served.

The in-room dining service was no better. I requested two plates for lunch, and despite multiple follow-ups, the plates were brought only after 1.5 hours. This delay forced me to have my lunch at 4 p.m., which was extremely inconvenient and unacceptable for a hotel of this standard.

Overall, the lack of promptness, coordination, and basic service efficiency in both the restaurant and in-room dining was very disappointing. I hope the management takes this feedback seriously and improves the speed and attentiveness of their service.

text.text:
Came for a conference. Didn't stay at the property, and honestly, wouldn't like to.

Yes, the organisers of the event Didn't plan the event nicely. But the hotel team Didn't as well.

In the menu, one of the dishes were veg Manchurian, when they had to refill, probably they were out of Manchurian and in the gravy they had put dahi ke kebab. I mean like seriously? Who does that? I mean a dhabha also wouldn't do this. What if someone is lactose intolerant and has that? Anyway, that's not even the point.. the point is at a 5 star hotel.. food shortage happened (which is okay) but you can't serve anything and think that the guests are fool, they won't realise.

And I am like 1000% sure they were dahi ke kebab as I am a chef turned into a food safety auditor.

The plates and spoons- super dirty. Food marks present, water marks still there. Not washed properly,  and not even tried to wipe. Cutlery had smell.

I also couldn't find any bins in the public areas.. i mean that's weird, probably some policy or something.

The smoking zone in the restaurant-- idk how often it is cleaned and the buds are trashed out. I mean i like went 4-5 times.. and it was same.

Only good thing - the public areas washroom (that too only lobby) was well maintained.
The washroom at the conference floor (2) - no one bothered to check the cleanliness or the toilet roll replenishment.

Also - the uniform if the service team during the meals... it Didn't feel like i was attending a conference at a 5 star hotel that too sheraton.

Appreciation only for the security team. Very hospitable.

text.text:
We had the opportunity to attend a conference at Hotel Oterra in Electronic City Phase I, and the entire experience was truly impressive from start to finish.

🏢 Conference Facilities:

The conference hall was elegant, well-maintained, and equipped with all necessary facilities—projectors, sound system, comfortable seating, and excellent air-conditioning. The staff ensured the setup was perfect before we arrived, and any technical requirements during the session were taken care of immediately. The ambience was just right—quiet, focused, and professional.

🍽️ Food Experience:

One of the biggest highlights of the event was the food. From welcome drinks to lunch and tea breaks, the entire spread was delicious, fresh, and well-presented. The variety was impressive—covering both Indian and continental options—and everything tasted great. The desserts were a particular favorite among many of us!

👥 Staff Hospitality:

A special mention to the Oterra staff, who were polite, attentive, and proactive throughout the event. They greeted us with a smile, helped with directions, served food professionally, and ensured the entire experience felt smooth and hassle-free. Their warmth and dedication reflected the high standards of the hotel.

🧘‍♂️ Overall Atmosphere:

The property itself is beautiful—calm, green, and spacious, even though it’s located in the heart of Electronic City. The interiors are well-designed, and the hotel feels luxurious without being overwhelming. Even during a busy event, the environment remained peaceful and well-managed.

---

✅ What We Loved:

Spacious and professionally managed conference space

Excellent variety and quality of food

Prompt, kind, and professional staff

Clean and well-maintained premises

A smooth, well-organized overall experience

---

🌟 Final Verdict:

Hotel Oterra exceeded our expectations when it came to hosting a corporate event. Whether it’s the quality of service, the food, or the overall ambience, everything was thoughtfully arranged and professionally handled. We left with great memories and lots of appreciation for the team.

Definitely a go-to venue for future business meetings, conferences, or even a relaxed stay in Electronic City.

text.text:
OTERRA Hotel Bangalore is a masterclass in urban sanctuary design – where serene minimalism meets intuitive comfort in the heart of India’s tech capital. From the moment you step into the lobby, the calming earthy tones, soft lighting, and lush vertical gardens dissolve the city’s chaos, instantly transporting you into a haven of curated calm. The rooms, dubbed "pods," redefine compact luxury: ingeniously designed spaces with soundproofed walls, plush memory-foam beds, monsoon showers, and mood lighting that cocoon you in peace. Every inch feels thoughtfully crafted – no clutter, only purposeful elegance.

Dining is a revelation. The Earth Kitchen celebrates hyper-local flavors with dishes like Mangalorean fish curry, Coorg pork, and organic ragi rotis – each plate bursting with farm-fresh authenticity. Don’t miss their signature filter coffee or appam breakfast! Bar.Apothecary elevates evenings with botanical-inspired cocktails (try the ‘Kaffir Lime Smash’) and curated small plates in a chic, intimate setting. Even in-room dining impresses with speed and flavor.

text.text:
We have had the privilege of hosting our parents 50th wedding anniversary at Novotel
Before I write a review I would like to personally thank from bottom of my heart the team of Novotel Sarthak, Akshita, Chef Devendra, Rajat for their immaculate service extended to us
Any client for any event would like to have a hassle free implementation of their event with expectations of excellence and I must say Akshita and Sarthak have delivered that to us. Being out of India and organising an event is a tough job but with their help at every point made my job much easier. They have extended help beyond their call of duty.
Chef Devendra has been instrumental in providing us with absolutely delicious food that all our guest raved about. His guidance and support for curated menu for our event has reflected in many praises from our guests. Thank you 🙏
Banquet manager Rajat has been absolutely wonderful in managing the banquet preparation and taking care of the needs of the guests and our requests
Once again I would recommend Novotel for any social events and I am truly thankful to the team for all their efforts to make our event a success
Thank you 🙏

text.text:
I stayed at Shreyas over the recent Xmas holidays. Compared to my stay 4 years ago, my experience was mixed.
Pros:  The Ayurvedic oil massage was amazing.  The spa treatments are relaxing. I especially liked the steam room.  For the classes, I enjoyed the meditation instruction.

Cons:
My dining experience was subpar. There were few options for a light diet, as I had requested. I ended up just having toast and tea, and no protein options.  I missed the group dining set up from the prior stay, where I got to meet people from around the world. This time, the table set up felt isolating, and meals were quiet and the environment felt somewhat depressing. I learned that the retreat is focusing on treatment and discouraging socializing.

I enjoyed the cottage experience the last time, but there were upkeep issues this time. On my first day, Black ants were crawling on the toilet in my room. It required multiple follow-ups to get a change to a new room.

The yoga classes were okay. On my last day, I learned from another visitor, that there were more advanced yoga classes.

Overall, this retreat fits boutique, but no longer luxurious, in my experience.

text.text:
Pros: Service very quick and attentive, breakfast was absolutely amazing. They offer both japanese and indian sets as well as a wide variety of buffet options. Very pleased with this. The location of the hotel was also very close to the shops, cafes and busy streets, just a short walk which was very convenient. The rooms were beautiful, very tidy, clean sheets and comfortable atmosphere with warm and welcoming decor.

Cons: Bathroom however, could use improvement. I liked the Japanese style toilet, but the showers could be improved. The water leaked everywhere due to the wide spray and high pressure shower head. It would get onto the shower curtains, the edges of the bath tub and eventually all over the bathroom floor, then to the corridor and up to the front door!! We needed multiple towels to soak up the water. Besides this con, everything else was perfect.

text.text: Absolutely loved my stay at Courtyard by Marriott! From the moment I walked in, the staff was warm, welcoming, and attentive. Special mention to the hospitality team for going the extra mile to make everything smooth. Whether it’s for business or leisure, this place truly lives up to the Marriott standard. Highly recommended!

text.text:
We visited for their Sunday brunch. While the overall experience was decent, we felt that the variety of food options did not justify the price, especially when compared to other hotel brunches available in the market especially "The Market by Ritz Carlton".

Food & Variety:
The quality of the food was good, but the options were quite limited across all categories—starters, main course, and desserts. Other hotel brunches we've tried included a wider selection from Indian, Japanese, Chinese, and Italian cuisines, making feel more value for money. In comparison, the spread here felt basic and lacking in variety.

Taste & Presentation:
The dishes were well-prepared, but nothing particularly stood out. The presentation was decent, and the food was fresh, but not extraordinary for the price paid.

Overall Experience:
While the ambience and service were up to Marriott standards, the food options did not meet expectations for a premium brunch experience.

It's okay to try once, but I'm not sure if I would go a second time.

text.text:
This was my first time staying at this hotel, which I chose for its proximity to our meeting location. The room was decent, though I was initially assigned two single beds instead of my usual preference for a king bed. However, I was later upgraded to a suite.

The shower lacked a proper screen, causing water to spill out, and the water temperature turned cold after use. The amenities were sufficient but of low quality, such as the toothbrush. The pillows were too soft for my preference, so I had to stack two. The working desk felt cramped in the corner, and the power outlet was inconveniently hidden inside a wooden cabinet—it would be better if it were more accessible.

Breakfast was excellent, especially the Indian food, which I enjoyed the most. The waitress took orders and served them at the table, providing amazing service. The vegetarian options were delicious, though the non-vegetarian selection could have been more varied.

For lunch, we dined at the same cafeteria, and the food was outstanding, particularly the fish curry, prawns, and lamb biryani. However, the food at the poolside bar was just average. We had a private room next to the bar, but it was uncomfortably hot, as the air conditioning didn’t seem to work properly.

The hotel is located outside the main city, near a business district. While the distance to key locations may seem short, the traffic is intense, so extra travel time is necessary. The room rates are quite expensive for a Courtyard hotel in India compared to many other countries.

highlightedText.text: "The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean, and designed for comfort;"

text.text:
Stayed at this place for a good 10 days, and I can confidently say it was one of the best hospitality experiences I’ve had. Having stayed in some of the finest hotels across India, DoubleTree Suites by Hilton has earned a solid spot in my top three, alongside Leela Ambience and Taj Mumbai.

From the moment I checked in, I felt the warmth of their hospitality. The staff here is exceptional, genuinely welcoming, attentive, and always ready to go the extra mile to ensure you have the best stay. Be it my room, the breakfast, or the room service, they aced it all with ease.

The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean, and designed for comfort; the breakfast spread is delicious, offering a perfect mix of variety and quality; and the location is just right, close to all major IT parks, making it super convenient for work or leisure.

Attaching a few pictures from my time there; you will see why this place is worth every bit of the hype.

text.text: My wife and I have been to our fair share of 5-star hotels across India. But nothing has come close to the truly guest-centered experience at The Den Bengaluru. Right from the express check-in (from lobby to room immediately upon arrival), to the fantastic amenities in the room, to the great dining options - it’s an absolutely delightful experience all-around curated by the staff and management. The people really make this place feel like a home. Every single one of the staff (even the wonderful chefs!) got to know us over our 5 day stay and we became friends. They really do take care of their guests! We left with some amazing stories shared by the staff, and an indelible set of special memories of our stay at The Den! Special thanks to Mr. Amit (Front Desk Manager), Mr. Pradeep Kumar (Service Manager - F&B), Zack (the incredible mixologist at the bar), and everyone at The Den! We will be back for the Sunday Brunch soon! :) Much love!

text.text:
I recently stayed at The Den Hotel in Bangalore, and it was a remarkable experience from start to finish. The hotel’s modern design, coupled with a touch of luxury, creates a perfect balance between comfort and elegance.

Location:
The Den is located in Whitefield, a prime area of Bangalore, making it highly convenient for both business travelers and tourists. It’s close to IT parks and shopping centers, which made commuting and leisure activities easy.

Rooms & Amenities:
The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean, and equipped with all the necessary modern amenities. The attention to detail in the room’s design adds a sense of tranquility. The views from the higher floors are particularly stunning. The hotel also offers excellent facilities, including a well-equipped gym, a swimming pool, and a top-notch spa.

Dining:
One of the highlights was the dining experience. The hotel offers a wide variety of cuisines at its restaurants, from Indian to Continental. I was especially impressed with the breakfast buffet—an extensive spread with fresh and delicious options catering to all tastes.

Service:
The service at The Den is where it truly excels. The staff was courteous, attentive, and eager to assist. They went above and beyond to ensure that my stay was comfortable. Whether it was the front desk, housekeeping, or restaurant staff, everyone was professional and hospitable.

Overall Experience:
My stay at The Den was exceptional, and I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bangalore. Whether you’re on a business trip or a leisure stay, The Den offers a perfect combination of comfort, luxury, and convenience

text.text:
I visited Palm Meadows Resort in Bangalore for a Award Function and I must say, it was a fantastic experience.

The resort is located in a serene and peaceful area, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. The lush green surroundings and well-maintained gardens add to the overall beauty of the place. The staff at the resort were extremely friendly and welcoming, providing excellent customer service throughout our stay.

The rooms were spacious, clean, and tastefully decorated. The amenities provided were top-notch, including a minibar, flat-screen TV, and a comfortable bed. The bathroom was also well-maintained with all necessary toiletries provided.

One of the highlights of the resort is the swimming pool, which is large and clean. It is perfect for relaxing and enjoying a swim. The resort also has a well-equipped fitness center, tennis court, and a spa, providing ample options for recreational activities.

The dining options at Palm Meadows Resort were also impressive. The restaurant served a wide variety of cuisines, including Indian, Continental, and Chinese. The food was delicious and well-prepared, satisfying the taste buds of even the most discerning food lovers.

Overall, my stay at Palm Meadows Resort was a delightful experience. The tranquil ambiance, excellent service, luxurious amenities, and delicious food made it a perfect getaway from the city. I would highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a peaceful and luxurious stay in Bangalore.

text.text:
Nestled within the serene confines of Adarsh Palm Meadows, Palm Meadows Resort offers a tranquil escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Situated amidst the sprawling mega residential township in Whitefield, Bangalore, the resort seamlessly blends luxury with nature, providing guests with an unparalleled experience of relaxation and rejuvenation.

During my recent stay at Palm Meadows Resort, I had the pleasure of staying in a Superior Twin Bedroom with an attached balcony. The room was spacious, tastefully decorated, and offered breathtaking views of the lush greenery surrounding the property. The balcony provided the perfect spot to unwind and soak in the peaceful ambiance of the resort.

One of the most remarkable aspects of Palm Meadows Resort is its location within the Adarsh Palm Meadows township. Surrounded by acres of pristine land, the resort offers a sense of seclusion and tranquility, disconnecting guests from the outside world and providing a truly peaceful stay. This aspect is particularly appealing for those seeking a getaway where they can truly unwind and recharge.

The resort itself boasts a range of amenities designed to cater to every need and preference. From the state-of-the-art gymnasium to the indoor and outdoor games facilities, as well as multiple swimming pools and a full-fledged spa, there is no shortage of activities to indulge in during your stay. Whether you're looking to relax by the poolside or pamper yourself with rejuvenating spa treatments, Palm Meadows Resort has you covered.

Dining at Palm Meadows Resort is a culinary delight, with options to suit every palate. Cafe Palmyra offers an International Culinary theatre experience with both indoor and poolside seating, while Oak Tavern serves up brilliantly crafted cocktails alongside house delicacies. The variety of dining options ensures that guests can indulge in a gastronomic journey throughout their stay.

In addition to leisure facilities, Palm Meadows Resort also caters to corporate travelers with private meeting rooms, a business center, and a serene atmosphere ideal for conferences and meetings. This versatility makes the resort a popular choice for both leisure and business travelers alike.

During my stay at Palm Meadows Resort, a staff member graciously assisted me with tying a knot for a special occasion. Their willingness to help and attention to detail exemplified the exceptional service at the resort. Their kindness made my stay even more memorable. Highly commendable service.

Overall, my experience at Palm Meadows Resort was nothing short of exceptional. From the luxurious accommodations to the impeccable service and serene surroundings, this resort truly lives up to its reputation as a pioneer amongst luxury resorts in the Silicon Valley of India. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat or a productive business stay, Palm Meadows Resort offers the perfect blend of nature and luxury for an unforgettable experience.

text.text: Feeling honored and proud to write a review, because whatever I will mention here, that would be very minimum than actual, and also due to this Superb Fantastic Hospitality, Amazing Stay; Excellent Service in Sheraton Grand, Awesome; Best Five Star Hotel in Bangalore. Honestly speaking that- I am really so spellbound, overwhelmed, felling exited and glad to express my gratitude after my stay in this hotel, along with my family, kids as well. I indeed would like to appreciate the entire team of this hotel from top to bottom, along with all management teams, entire ground staffs as well. My family and I had a delightful experience at the hotel from the point of check-in, till checkout. We spent the best time in this hotels in recent holidays . And we really enjoyed a lot. Throughout the entire stay time period, they have just made me to feel like the emperor of that Grand dynasty. Ms. Megha Baidya, Mr. Ajit Anurag,  Mr. Sanjay Gupta, Mr. Subhodeep, other staffs including entire team at Sheraton did a fantastic arrangement for us, arranged a beautiful welcome for us too including bouquet of flowers and many gifts, what they possibly could to make our stay ever-memorable, starting from decorating the room, upgrades, cakes, foods, drinks, balloons, many gifts , flower bookey and so on.. The entire staffs at the hotel are so hospitable, friendly, helpful, humble, cooperative, obedient, dutiful, supportive that I can’t even properly express by my words.  .. although I can only say "Thanks a ton to all of you, thank you so much for everything.. " . Furthermore, My Special Sincere thanks to Megha Baidya Madam, for all the efforts and arrangements to make the moments as ever-memorable for us. The suites, rooms with great amenities and the City-view windows were excellent , mind-blowing, incredible, amazing. I must say The Sheraton Grand staff is one of the best, the hospitality and caring I had received during our recent stay. Fantastic hospitality at Feast which is one of the restaurants at this Sheraton. We had breakfast included as part of our stay and there was a large variety of delicious food on offer for breakfast and all hosts looked after us extremely well during breakfast, lunch, dinner including excellent within room dine-in service. A very enjoyable experience! The check in and check out were very efficient, smooth and very quick. The rooms were spacious and well appointed. The welcome back note was a very nice gesture. The room service was very prompt and the food was very good. The breakfast spread was good and the food was of very good quality too. Overall I had a very good stay at this hotel. Moreover, I would like to express my great appreciation to the team in the club lounge for their excellent service provided to me during my stay here in Sheraton Grand. text.text:
“An Impeccable Stay: Flawless Comfort, Service, and Hospitality at Sheraton Grand Bengaluru Whitefield”

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Check‑in Excellence
From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with genuine warmth by Rinki (and her colleague whose name I regretfully did not catch). Their professionalism, grace, and efficiency set the tone for a superb stay.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Lobby Ambience & Welcoming Atmosphere
The lobby’s modern yet inviting decor created a serene and polished first impression. It felt both luxurious and comfortably approachable, a blend that impressed immediately.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Room Quality & Design
Stepping into my room felt like entering a stylish sanctuary. The thoughtful design, spacious layout, and upscale furnishings resonated deeply with my preference for comfort and aesthetics.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Impeccable Cleanliness
Every corner of the room was immaculate—from the gleaming floors to the crisp linens—affirming the hotel’s high standards in housekeeping.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Comfort of Bedding
The plush bed was the epitome of comfort: supportive, cozy, and ideal for restorative sleep after a busy day in Bengaluru.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Bathroom Excellence
The bathroom featured spotless surfaces, modern fixtures, premium toiletries, and excellent water pressure—truly a delight in daily routines.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Room Amenities & Functionality
Amenities such as high‑speed Wi‑Fi, a well‑equipped minibar, and user‑friendly electronics enhanced both convenience and enjoyment throughout my stay.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Room Service Efficiency
Requests for extra towels and beverages were handled promptly and courteously, showcasing the staff’s dedication to guest satisfaction.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Overall Comfort & Tranquility
Thanks to soundproofing and a peaceful vibe, the room offered a restful retreat from the bustle of the city.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Breakfast Buffet Quality
Breakfast was nothing short of fantastic. With a diverse spread—including freshly prepared Indian and continental options, seasonal fruits, and a live omelette station—the morning meal was as delicious as it was energizing.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Service During Breakfast
Staff were attentive without being intrusive, quickly refilling items and ensuring guest comfort—a model of hospitality excellence.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Culinary Presentation & Taste
Each dish was artfully presented and flavorful. The quality ingredients were evident, making every bite a memorable part of the dining experience.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Ambience in Dining Area
Bright, spacious, and thoughtfully arranged, the breakfast area felt both lively and relaxed—perfect for beginning the day.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Billing & Check‑out Smoothness
Check‑out was efficient and hassle‑free. Billing was accurate and transparent, and final farewells by staff were both gracious and professional.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ – Overall Staff Attitude
At every interaction—whether with front desk, housekeeping, or dining personnel—I experienced genuine kindness, professionalism, and attentiveness.

🌟 Final Verdict: 100/100 Stars 🌟

Every dimension of my stay—from check‑in to check‑out, room to breakfast—was executed with precision, care, and genuine hospitality. The Sheraton Grand Bengaluru Whitefield not only met but exceeded my expectations at every turn.

I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to business and leisure travelers alike seeking a stellar, worry‑free stay in Bengaluru’s Whitefield area. Kudos to the entire team for delivering a flawless experience. I look forward to returning!

text.text:
Wonderful Stay at Radisson Bengaluru City Center! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I had an amazing experience at Radisson Bengaluru City Center! The hotel is perfectly located in the heart of the city, making it convenient for exploring. A shopping mall is just 4 km away, which is great for a quick shopping trip.

The restaurant serves a fantastic selection of international cuisine, including vegan and gluten-free options, catering to all dietary preferences. The rooms have a warm and welcoming feel, with thoughtful touches like hot chocolate and soaked almonds for a healthy snack. The amenities are top-notch, with high-quality bath products from a well-known brand, and the bed and pillows are incredibly comfortable—I slept like a dream on the crisp, white sheets!

Housekeeping was exceptionally attentive, ensuring a spotless and comfortable stay. Every evening, the rooftop hi-tea was a lovely experience, offering a splendid view of the city. The F&B staff were super helpful and even took beautiful pictures of guests at the rooftop, adding a special touch to the experience.

The in-room dining service was prompt, and I highly recommend trying the Hakka prawn noodles and the soothing turmeric milk—both were absolutely delicious! One of the most thoughtful touches was the 15-minute foot massage teaser, which was a blessing after a long flight. They also offer 15% off on full-body massages, and I must say, it was one of the best I’ve had in India—incredibly relaxing, and the head massage worked wonders for my migraine!

Overall, Radisson Bengaluru City Center exceeded my expectations with thoughtful hospitality, luxurious comfort, and outstanding service. I can’t wait to return! Highly recommended! 🌟✨

The Sheraton Grand Hotel Bengaluru offers a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and impeccable hospitality. My stay here was truly exceptional, and every aspect of the hotel exceeded my expectations.

The rooms are spacious, modern, and elegantly designed, with every amenity thoughtfully provided to ensure a comfortable stay. The beds are incredibly cozy, and the attention to detail in the décor adds a touch of sophistication.

The dining options are outstanding, with a variety of restaurants offering diverse cuisines. Every meal was a delight, with fresh ingredients, exquisite flavors, and top-notch service. The breakfast spread, in particular, was a highlight, offering something for every palate.

The hotel’s facilities are world-class. The serene pool, well-equipped fitness center, and luxurious spa create the perfect environment for relaxation. The location is also ideal, providing easy access to key attractions and business hubs in Bengaluru.

What truly sets the Sheraton Grand apart is its staff. They are warm, professional, and go above and beyond to ensure guests have a seamless and memorable experience.

Whether you’re visiting for business or leisure, the Sheraton Grand Hotel Bengaluru is a phenomenal choice.

text.text:
As a solo female American traveler, my recent 8 night stay at the Courtyard Bengaluru Hebbal exceeded all expectations. The hotel’s incredible service, particularly from the breakfast staff, guest services team, and the warm and professional security and front door staff, made me feel completely safe, comfortable, and cared for throughout my visit.

Each morning started with a delightful experience at breakfast. The team was attentive, friendly, and thoughtful, quickly remembering my preferences and offering personalized service that went above and beyond. Mr. Abhijit was a true delight welcoming and caring for me every morning with. The staff's recommendations of local dishes added a wonderful cultural touch, and their cheerful demeanor created a welcoming start to my day.

The guest services team was phenomenal. While everyone was fantastic, Ms Boii went above and beyond. As a solo traveler, I appreciated her proactive approach to ensuring my comfort and safety. From checking in on me to providing insightful local tips, they handled every request with professionalism and genuine care. Their ability to anticipate my needs and make thoughtful recommendations helped me navigate Bengaluru with ease.

The security and front door staff played a key role in making me feel secure and valued. Their warm smiles, polite assistance with luggage, and attention to detail gave me peace of mind at all times. Whether it was greeting me after a day of exploring or ensuring the smooth handling of arrivals and departures, their presence added an extra layer of comfort to my stay.

The level of hospitality I experienced at Courtyard Bengaluru Hebbal was truly exceptional. As a solo female traveler, I felt completely safe and supported every step of the way. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Bengaluru, especially solo travelers, and I look forward to returning in the future.

text.text:
OTERRA Hotel Bangalore is a masterclass in urban sanctuary design – where serene minimalism meets intuitive comfort in the heart of India’s tech capital. From the moment you step into the lobby, the calming earthy tones, soft lighting, and lush vertical gardens dissolve the city’s chaos, instantly transporting you into a haven of curated calm. The rooms, dubbed "pods," redefine compact luxury: ingeniously designed spaces with soundproofed walls, plush memory-foam beds, monsoon showers, and mood lighting that cocoon you in peace. Every inch feels thoughtfully crafted – no clutter, only purposeful elegance.

Dining is a revelation. The Earth Kitchen celebrates hyper-local flavors with dishes like Mangalorean fish curry, Coorg pork, and organic ragi rotis – each plate bursting with farm-fresh authenticity. Don’t miss their signature filter coffee or appam breakfast! Bar.Apothecary elevates evenings with botanical-inspired cocktails (try the ‘Kaffir Lime Smash’) and curated small plates in a chic, intimate setting. Even in-room dining impresses with speed and flavor.

text.text:
The Oterra, 5-star deluxe luxury hotel nestled in the heart of the Electronic City amidst 2.5 acres of landscaped lawns, with premium accommodations, a variety of luxurious amenities, dedicated restaurants featuring signature cuisine and dedicated event and meeting spaces. This unique location places you within easy reach of the city’s dynamic business centre and IT hubs.
This luxurious 271-room hotel is ideally situated for business travellers and discerning leisure guests, the hotel offers a sanctuary of comfort and unparalleled service. Each room is meticulously designed to cater to your every need, featuring plush furnishings, premium amenities, and breathtaking views of the city skyline or the pool.

A modern 24 hour fitness centre equipped with cutting-edge equipment and personalised training programs is available for fitness enthusiasts.
A culinary odyssey at Oterra, we offer two distinct elevated dining experiences, Ahara, Indian Fine Dining and East, Pan-Asian. Each restaurant offers a unique journey, an immersive experience that tantalises all your senses. Picture a carefully curated ambience, impeccable service, and exquisite cuisine that transforms dining into art. Both restaurants offer a stunning view of the bustling city and the breathtaking sunset, providing a truly unforgettable dining experience.

text.text:
I had exceptional experience in this hotel
during my business trip in 2023.

The rooms are spacious, elegantly furnished, and equipped with modern amenities. The beds are extremely comfortable, and the cleanliness standards are impeccable. The bathroom is well-appointed with high-quality toiletries, and the housekeeping service is prompt and efficient having daily cleaning services.

I liked the selections of the breakfast buffet having diverse cuisines.

The staff at The Oterra are courteous, professional, and always ready to assist. Check-in and check-out processes are smooth and efficient. The airport and daily transfer service is really convenient and flexible.

Conveniently located in the heart of Bangalore, The Oterra offers easy access to major attractions, shopping districts, and business hubs. Despite its central location, the hotel maintains a serene and tranquil environment.

The Oterra is an exemplary 5-star hotel that lives up to its reputation. Whether you're in Bangalore for business or leisure, this hotel ensures a luxurious and memorable stay. Highly recommended for its outstanding service, excellent facilities, and prime location.

text.text:
Located in the vibrant city of Bengaluru, Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road is a luxurious oasis amidst the bustling energy of India's Silicon Valley. From the moment you step into the sleek and modern lobby, you're greeted with impeccable hospitality and a sense of tranquility that sets the tone for an unforgettable stay.

The hotel's spacious and elegantly designed rooms offer a perfect blend of comfort and style, providing guests with a peaceful retreat after a day of exploring the city or attending business meetings. Each room is thoughtfully equipped with modern amenities, including plush bedding, high-speed internet access, and panoramic views of the city skyline or lush greenery surrounding the property.

One of the standout features of Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road is its exceptional dining options. From the tantalizing flavors of Indian cuisine at Blue Terrain to the delectable international fare at The Square, there's something to satisfy every palate. The hotel's innovative culinary offerings, coupled with its warm and attentive service, ensure that every meal is a memorable experience.

For those looking to unwind and rejuvenate, the hotel's wellness facilities are second to none. Guests can indulge in a relaxing massage at the on-site spa, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool, or maintain their fitness routine at the fully equipped gym. Additionally, the hotel's convenient location provides easy access to nearby attractions, including shopping malls, entertainment venues, and corporate offices.

What truly sets Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road apart, however, is its exceptional commitment to guest satisfaction. The dedicated staff goes above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of your stay exceeds expectations, from seamless check-in and personalized service to thoughtful touches that make you feel right at home.

Whether you're visiting Bengaluru for business or leisure, Novotel Bengaluru Outer Ring Road offers a luxurious and welcoming retreat that promises to make your stay truly unforgettable. With its unparalleled amenities, world-class dining, and warm hospitality, it's no wonder that this hotel is consistently rated as one of the best in the city.

text.text:
I recently stayed at The Chancery Hotel and I must say that my experience was exceptional!

Manager, Mr. Abhilash, goes leaps and bounds to ensure customer satisfaction and the hospitality he ensures that is provided to the guests is top notch!

Two professionals, Mahipal and Sakshi, in particular, stood out for their exceptional service.
Mahipal was always ready to assist me with anything I needed during my stay. He was courteous and professional, and he made sure that all of my requests were taken care of promptly. His attention to detail was remarkable, and it was evident that he takes great pride in his work.
Sakshi was also an outstanding professional. She was always warm and welcoming, and she made sure that I felt right at home during my stay. Her cheerful attitude and willingness to go above and beyond to ensure my satisfaction made my stay at the hotel even more enjoyable.

In addition to the exceptional service provided by the staffs, the hotel's cleanliness and great food were also noteworthy aspects of my stay.
The housekeeping department did an outstanding job of keeping my room clean and tidy throughout my stay. The room was spotless upon my arrival, and it was maintained that way throughout. I could tell that the hotel takes great pride in maintaining high standards of cleanliness and hygiene.

text.text:
The Chancery Hotel presents itself as a refined and elegant accommodation option, aiming to provide a sophisticated stay for its guests 🏨✨. The hotel typically features well-appointed rooms, designed with modern amenities and a touch of classic style, creating a comfortable and luxurious environment 🛌🛋️. You can expect attentive service from the staff, who strive to ensure a seamless and enjoyable experience for every guest 😊👋. The hotel often includes amenities such as a fitness center, dining options, and business facilities, catering to both leisure and business travelers 🏋️‍♂️🍽️💼.

However, sometimes the “chancery” part of the name might lead you to expect a grand, diplomatic affair, with ambassadors and dignitaries sipping champagne in the lobby 🥂👑. In reality, it’s more like a well-dressed business traveler’s haven, where you’re more likely to find someone quietly working on a laptop than negotiating international treaties 💻🌍. The hotel aims for a polished and professional atmosphere, which can sometimes feel a bit… reserved. Think of it as the well-mannered cousin who always remembers to send a thank-you note, but maybe forgets to tell a joke 📝😄.

Overall, The Chancery Hotel offers a solid and reliable stay, with a focus on comfort and convenience. It may not be the most exciting or quirky hotel in town, but it delivers on its promise of a refined and pleasant experience. If you're looking for a dependable and well-maintained hotel, The Chancery is a safe bet.

text.text:
Courtyard by Marriott Bengaluru Outer Ring Road is a premium business hotel known for its excellent hospitality, modern amenities, and convenient location. Situated along the Outer Ring Road, it is strategically positioned near major IT hubs like Marathahalli, Bellandur, and Sarjapur, making it an ideal stay for business travelers.

The hotel offers well-designed, spacious rooms with contemporary interiors, plush bedding, and modern facilities such as high-speed Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and a well-equipped work desk. The rooms provide a comfortable and luxurious experience, ensuring a pleasant stay for both short and long-term guests.

One of the highlights of the hotel is its exceptional dining experience. The on-site restaurants, including MoMo Café and BG’s Poolside Bar & Grill, serve a variety of Indian and international cuisines, offering delicious food with great ambiance. The breakfast buffet is particularly appreciated for its variety and quality.

The hotel also features a well-equipped fitness center, a relaxing spa, and an outdoor swimming pool, adding to the overall guest experience. The staff is known for their warm hospitality and efficient service, ensuring a seamless stay.

Overall, Courtyard by Marriott Bengaluru Outer Ring Road is a top choice for business travelers and leisure guests looking for comfort, convenience, and excellent service in Bangalore.

text.text:
A Delightful Stay in the Heart of Bangalore

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Marriott Courtyard in Bangalore, and I must say, the experience was exceptional. The staff were outstanding, offering a warm welcome right from the start and ensuring a smooth and efficient check-in process.

The room was impeccably clean and beautifully furnished with modern amenities, providing a comfortable and serene retreat. The bed was especially comfortable, ensuring a good night's sleep—a real highlight of my stay.

Dining at the hotel was a delightful experience. The breakfast buffet offered a wide variety of both local and international dishes, all of which were fresh and delicious. The restaurant staff deserve special mention for their courteous and attentive service, which made meals all the more enjoyable.

Located conveniently for both tourists and business travelers, the Marriott Courtyard offers easy access to major attractions and business areas. Its quiet ambiance is a pleasant oasis in the bustling city.

Overall, my stay at the Marriott Courtyard Bangalore was fantastic. I highly recommend it to anyone visiting the city. The combination of stellar service, comfortable accommodations, and a prime location make it a top choice.
